text: al cancer may include the following:         -  Surgery (radical hysterectomy and removal of lymph nodes in the pelvis so they can be viewed under a microscope to check for cancer cells) followed by adjuvant chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy.    - Chemotherapy and internal and external radiation therapy for patients who cannot have surgery.    -  Hormone therapy for patients who cannot have surgery or radiation therapy.    -  Targeted therapy with mTOR inhibitors (everolimus or ridaforolimus
